response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it is valued at $10,000 by you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $9,500. This opportunity is unique and tailored to ensure you receive the best value for your investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 9500}
